articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: How modern humans use land has had an unprecedented impact on the planet. Historical information on human land use is lacking, impacting the quality of climate models used today. An international group of archaeologists is working on a project to improve the climate models. They are looking for historical information on land use.

articles.title: Join the Great Backyard Bird Count
articles.summary: Annual Great Backyard Bird Count takes place at Brickyard Nature Park, 759 Concord Road, Crawfordsville, at 10 a.m. on Saturday. The program is sponsored by the Cornell Lab of Ornithology, the National Audubon Society, and Wild Birds Unlimited. Since 1970, the populations of common bird species have crashed in the last 50 years.
